name: Hot place
description:
Controls:

  • Movement: w, a, s, d
  • Slow time: space(hold)
  • Health kit: q
  • Explosion: e
  • Shop: left shift
  • Pause: escape

Tips:

  • Platforms are different, can you understand how they work?
  • If you find music annoying, turn down your sound volume
  • Play a few times to get best experience

A game that I have made for LD31 compo. Rate/Download standalone here. I will probably continue to develop this game, so remember to keep checking this for updates!
